body: How do you manage erlang applications that are not part of the Erlang/OTP release ? Where do you usually install them ? If you install them aside of Erlang/OTP release, how do you tell erlang VM where to look them up (Yes, I know about -pz flag but it seems to be a little awkward for me to use that flag when there are more than one third-party apps)
title: How to manage third-party erlang applications?
